title: The Reign of Workers and Peasants Will Be Without End
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Circular; with red star and the inscription, in Russian, "The reign of workers and peasants will be without end" around border; in the center a white partial orb, a hammer and sickle, and the inscription, in Russian, "Commune"
name: Plate
